SELECT REPLY_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO REPLY (reply_num, member_num, com_num, reply_content, reply_created_at) VALUES (#{replyNum}, #{memberNum}, #{comNum}, #{content}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT r.reply_num as reply_num, r.com_num as com_num, r.reply_content as reply_content, r.reply_created_at as reply_created_at, m.member_num as member_num, m.member_name as member_name FROM reply r INNER JOIN member m ON r.member_num = m.member_num WHERE r.com_num=#{comNum} ORDER BY reply_created_at ASC
